evidence.claim: Cognie AI uses AWS Lambda for serverless computing, enabling scalable architectures.
The platform supports FHIR APIs for healthcare data interoperability.
Cognie AI has HIPAA compliance for its healthcare data solutions, ensuring secure handling of patient information.
Integration with HL7 messaging standards is implemented for EHR compatibility.
Utilizes Google Cloud for data storage and processing in the healthcare sector.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found for X12 transactions or clearinghouse capabilities on their site.
